name: Dark Lord: Peacemaker
description:
This game is part of The Reanimator Saga. The Reanimator makes her appearance in it and MaouCat Studio's Dice and the Tower of the Reanimator: Glorious Princess, but the stories are independent of each other and can be enjoyed separately.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1489290/

Gameplay



Create a character. Customize your race, sex, name, class and non-combat skill. Create a unique protagonist.

Who do you want to venture with? A human cleric, a dark elf ranger, or an orc defender? Gather a party that's the best for you!

Choices affect the plot. How you interact with people in neighboring country depends on you, but beware - you may start a war.

Turn-based combat with a focus on teamwork. Beware classes have their own strengths and weaknesses. Complement each other to win.

Main Characters




Dark Lord
The dark-one monarch who has lived for five hundred years. She is determined to end the perennial struggle between dark ones and humans.


Hero
A descendant of the legendary hero. It is a calling for him to expel dark ones.


Philia the Human Cleric
A cleric of the border sanctuary. She has a dream that one day everyone in the world can be equal.


Venom the Dark Elf Ranger
A dark elf who specializes in swordplay and archery. His close friend was killed by the Hero.


Coyote the Orc Defender
A boy warrior from a tribe. He longed for the acceptance of humans and dark elves.


Sanguine the Reanimator
A master of alchemy and necromancy. She is unscrupulous for her goals.


Bambooblade the Eastern Warrior
The protagonist of MaouCat Studio's Dice and the Tower of the Reanimator: Glorious Princess. He comes from the Silver Kingdom in the Southeast.
